channel.title: 414 - Uhmar - Creating the perfect combination - by Limits
channel.description:
[center]
[font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=1em][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/dcfpsm.png[/img][/size][/font][/font] [font=verdana][size=2.65em]Welcome to Uhmar 414[/size][/font]
[font=verdana][size=2em]Uhmar 414 is, first of all, not a real 414. It is a 317 however I have my own custom highly modified client that practically emulates the game frame and interfaces of the revision.[/size][/font]
[font=verdana][size=2em]I began working on this because I couldn't find the one perfect revision, therefore I mashed up components from 414-474.[/size][/font]
[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/dgo4gh.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/fc5o34.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/5b7edk.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/m7yz9t.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/rm0ah3.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/f06sz.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2rlyuxk.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2i0q7hz.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/29c9i12.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2dan253.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/2znpgrq.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/257k9jq.png[/img]
Based off of Project Insanity...
- 464 Maps - 474 Items - 474 Anims/Gfx - 414 Gameframe/Interfaces - 474 Npcs
[u][b]Server Features[/b][/u]:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [u][b]Prayer[/b][/u]:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate -Zombie
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] [u][b]Agility[/b][/u]:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u]:
- Correct anims - Sounds - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [u][b]Woodcutting[/b][/u]:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [b][u]Mining[/u][/b]:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) - Rock Golem
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img] [b][u]Fletching[/u][/b]:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [b][u]Crafting[/u][/b]:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] [b][u]Thieving[/u][/b]:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [u][b]Fishing[/b][/u]:
- All fishing spots - All fishes fishable - Correct equipment - Correct animations - Moving locations
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [u][b]Cooking[/b][/u]:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food [font=verdana]- All foods edible[/font] - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [u][b]Runecrafting[/b][/u]:
- Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [u][b]Herblore[/b][/u]:
- All potions makeable - Identifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [u][b]Smithing[/b][/u]:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img] [b][u]Slayer[/u][/b]:
- All Slayer Masters [font=verdana]- All Slayer Monsters[/font] [font=verdana]- Basic Slayer Gem[/font] [font=verdana]- Points[/font] [font=verdana]- Shop[/font]
[u][b]Farming[/b][/u]:
-Not Started
[u][b]Construction[/b][/u]:
-Probably not going to happen
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img] [u][b]Combat[/b][/u]:
-85% Clipped ( Projectiles are clipped, melee is 90% clipped, npcs are clipped, following is clipped) -Correct Range Formula -Correct Melee Max hit Formula
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [u][b]Minigames[/b][/u]:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows -Fight Pits -Pest Control -Fishing Trawler -Gnome Ball -Bar crawl -Blast Furnace -Champion's Challenge -Chompy hunting -Games room -Jungle Clean Up -Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne) -Rogue Trader -Rogue's Den -Splitbark Armour -Temple Trekking -Magic Training Arena
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img] [u][b]Random Events[/b][/u]:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie [font=verdana]-Rock Golem[/font] [font=verdana]-Spirit Tree[/font] [font=verdana]-Zombie[/font] [font=verdana]-Evil Chicken[/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img] [u][b]Quests[/b][/u]:
-Cook's Assistant [font=Verdana]-Romeo and Juliet[/font] [font=Verdana]-Witch's Potion[/font] [font=Verdana]-Imp Catcher[/font] [font=Verdana]-Doric's Quest[/font] [font=Verdana]-Vampire Slayer[/font] [font=Verdana]-Restless Ghost[/font] [font=Verdana]-Gertrude's Pussy[/font] [font=Verdana]-Sheep Shearer[/font] [font=Verdana]-Rune Mysteries[/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img] [u][b]Miscellaneous[/b][/u]:
-99 % of runescape spawns -All runescape shops
I still need to fix up a ton of stuff haha
-90 % of runescape foods added -90 % of all doors around the world (opening and closing) -90 % potions (A few might be missing) -Working NPC Drops -All guilds openable with requirements -Wilderness warning sign -Normal and Ancient Magics -Lunar Magics -Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more...) -Actual RuneScape Starter -Actual RuneScape Prices -Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape -Report Abuse -Runescape like Sailing with all locations -Full Gnome Glider Transportation -Bank Pins -Christmas Crackers -Fully Functional Teletabs -Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc...) -Full Weapon Poisioning -Add or Drop Item Function (If you don't have enough room it goes on the ground) -Chat Filtering System -Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides -Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass -Running with Energy -Weight -Runescape Combat Exp Rates -Magic Carpet -Ladder System -Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Recoil) (Life) -Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet) -Clue scrolls (Tons of scrolls loaded) -Hide Tanning -Canoes -Music Player -Looping animations added (Don't stop half way through) -Random Events -Crystal Chest -Flax Stringing -Aubury -Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking) -Clipped Following -Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) - Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc) - Perfect Magic Enchanting added - Al Kharid Desert Added - Great Membership system Countdown/Members/Non members Items - Teleporting to Zanaris with Dramen staff in Inventory or equipped - Pets System Added - Global Drops[/center]

item.title: 414 - Uhmar - Creating the perfect combination - by Limits
item.dc:creator: @Advocatus Advocatus
item.description:
@Advocatus wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:13, topic:544023”][quote author=Advocatus link=topic=662903.msg4433368#msg4433368 date=1404221424]
414 doesnt use those interfaces for the sidebars. This looks more like 459 style interfaces with 377 sideicons.
[/quote]

What do the 414 interfaces look like? If you don’t mind :)[/quote]
They look like the 377 ones, except for the one tab that has house options.

Edit: here are screenies of all the interfaces in 414 that are changed.

Weapon interfaces appear the same as 377.
Skill tab http://i.gyazo.com/7b72da45a8a226e383edc5ae6af94bb5.png
Quest tab http://i.gyazo.com/78929e5bb5dc56b8c4d733d826c9c838.png
Equipment, prayer, magic, friends, ignore, logout are all the same as 377.
Options Tab http://i.gyazo.com/72371271b2df1a46e8ef2f6b36a7b42b.png
Controls Tab http://i.gyazo.com/f789c9667bd3fd7e05ae85b76b4188ad.png

Read full topic

item.title: 414 - Uhmar - Creating the perfect combination - by Limits
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[center]

[font=verdana][font=Verdana][size=1em][/size][/font][/font]
[font=verdana][size=2.65em]Welcome to Uhmar 414[/size][/font]

[font=verdana][size=2em]Uhmar 414 is, first of all, not a real 414. It is a 317 however I have my own custom highly modified client that practically emulates the game frame and interfaces of the revision.[/size][/font]

[font=verdana][size=2em]I began working on this because I couldn’t find the one perfect revision, therefore I mashed up components from 414-474.[/size][/font]












Based off of Project Insanity…

  • 464 Maps
  • 474 Items
  • 474 Anims/Gfx
  • 414 Gameframe/Interfaces
  • 474 Npcs

Server Features:

Prayer:

  • All bones bury-able
  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
    -Zombie

Agility:

  • Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable
  • Force movement mask
  • Correct animations used
  • Run energy affected by weight and level

Firemaking:

  • Correct anims
  • Sounds
  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Can’t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them

Woodcutting:

  • Stumps and regrowing trees
  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fell chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree
  • Canoes

Mining:

  • Emptying and refilling rocks
  • All ores can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe finding and animations
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gems
  • Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
  • Mining gems at shilo village
  • Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)
  • Rock Golem

Fletching:

  • All logs can be fletched
  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all

Crafting:

  • Gem cutting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewelry Molding

Thieving:

  • Stall Thieving
  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Times

Fishing:

  • All fishing spots
  • All fishes fishable
  • Correct equipment
  • Correct animations
  • Moving locations

Cooking:

  • All fishes cookable
  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
    [font=verdana]- All foods edible[/font]
  • Wine

Runecrafting:

  • Altar Enterting
  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss

Herblore:

  • All potions makeable
  • Identifying herbs
  • Weapon poisioning

Smithing:

  • All bars smithable
  • Smelting
  • Correct anims, working interfaces & objects

Slayer:

  • All Slayer Masters
    [font=verdana]- All Slayer Monsters[/font]
    [font=verdana]- Basic Slayer Gem[/font]
    [font=verdana]- Points[/font]
    [font=verdana]- Shop[/font]

Farming:

-Not Started

Construction:

-Probably not going to happen

Combat:

-85% Clipped ( Projectiles are clipped, melee is 90% clipped, npcs are clipped, following is clipped)
-Correct Range Formula
-Correct Melee Max hit Formula

Minigames:

-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Fight Caves
-Barrows
-Fight Pits
-Pest Control
-Fishing Trawler
-Gnome Ball
-Bar crawl
-Blast Furnace
-Champion’s Challenge
-Chompy hunting
-Games room
-Jungle Clean Up
-Pet Care (You get a pet, feed it, take care of it until it grows, and sell it for rewards at ardougne)
-Rogue Trader
-Rogue’s Den
-Splitbark Armour
-Temple Trekking
-Magic Training Arena

Random Events:

-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady
-Genie
[font=verdana]-Rock Golem[/font]
[font=verdana]-Spirit Tree[/font]
[font=verdana]-Zombie[/font]
[font=verdana]-Evil Chicken[/font]

Quests:

-Cook’s Assistant
[font=Verdana]-Romeo and Juliet[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Witch’s Potion[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Imp Catcher[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Doric’s Quest[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Vampire Slayer[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Restless Ghost[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Gertrude’s Pussy[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Sheep Shearer[/font]
[font=Verdana]-Rune Mysteries[/font]

Miscellaneous:

-99 % of runescape spawns
-All runescape shops

I still need to fix up a ton of stuff haha

-90 % of runescape foods added
-90 % of all doors around the world (opening and closing)
-90 % potions (A few might be missing)
-Working NPC Drops
-All guilds openable with requirements
-Wilderness warning sign
-Normal and Ancient Magics
-Lunar Magics
-Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more…)
-Actual RuneScape Starter
-Actual RuneScape Prices
-Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape
-Report Abuse
-Runescape like Sailing with all locations
-Full Gnome Glider Transportation
-Bank Pins
-Christmas Crackers
-Fully Functional Teletabs
-Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc…)
-Full Weapon Poisioning
-Add or Drop Item Function (If you don’t have enough room it goes on the ground)
-Chat Filtering System
-Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides
-Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass
-Running with Energy
-Weight
-Runescape Combat Exp Rates
-Magic Carpet
-Ladder System
-Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Recoil) (Life)
-Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet)
-Clue scrolls (Tons of scrolls loaded)
-Hide Tanning
-Canoes
-Music Player
-Looping animations added (Don’t stop half way through)
-Random Events
-Crystal Chest
-Flax Stringing
-Aubury
-Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking)
-Clipped Following
-Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc)

  • Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc)
  • Perfect Magic Enchanting added
  • Al Kharid Desert Added
  • Great Membership system Countdown/Members/Non members Items
  • Teleporting to Zanaris with Dramen staff in Inventory or equipped
  • Pets System Added
  • Global Drops[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: 414 - Uhmar - Creating the perfect combination - by Limits
